review: Google Play SD movies only stream in 2ch stereo?  When good old DVD has 5.1, something's not right here...Video streaming of home videos from Nexus phones is also another must have.Amazon - where's your app for streaming Amazon video on Chromecast?
author: TD "wasabe"

review: When using this device, if we do not continuously manipulate items on the screen, the image times out.  We use this as a tool for meetings with staff and students, generally using Excel or Word, and it would be nice if I did not have to keep reconnecting tot he device because we have not moved the mouse in a few minutes.  Besides this issue, this is a pretty cool tool.Thanks,Paul
author: Paul Valdez

review: This thing is awesome!  You can watch Netflix, You Tube, Hulu and so much more on your tv by just plugging this little device into your tv and using your cell phone as your "remote control".  Love love love it!
author: JZ "JZ"

review: I love this thing. I bought it for my vacation rental. How cool! Pull up Chrome on your computer, screen share to Chromecast.The future is now and it's awesome!
author: Dennydotco "Denny.co"

review: My Current HDMI cable does a superior job of bring content from laptop to TV. Chromecast was choppy at best for most links and still needs to iron out the bugs. If all you do is watch Youtube, than this is the device for you.
author: Jkkiller11

review: Set it up at my friend's apt. The price is right but I prefer my Apple TV. Both give NetFlix which is 90% of our viewing. Neither offer Amazon Prime movies.
author: Kenneth

review: I can finally watch Netflix in my bedroom or at my parent's house. I don't have to worry about not having an antenna or a cable box avaliable when I want to watch some TV. I also love that Flixster is supported now as well!!  The only other thing I could think of is if it could support the network apps, like CBS. But I am so thrilled with this.It's even worth the stupid hassle of having to reboot my Comcast router when I want to use it for Netflix. It's not Chromecast that is my problem; I think it's my router.
author: Amanda H "TxsTchMandy"

review: Still getting familiar with it but so far so good! Alot of great documentaries to choose from...wish there were a little mor recent movies to choose from but overall it is a great product!
author: Dorothy Cook

review: I bought this as my second chromecast for the bedroom. A bit tricky to set up 2 on one home wifi network, but after a little investigating, got it! Hence the 4 star rating! Otherwise would have given it a 5. Using this with Google Canary, you can stream videos stored on your laptop or desktop near flawlessly, like you can on your wireless devices.
author: fluffdog50

review: Very easy to use it. The video quality is excellent. I couldn't find a TV which could power it up, always have to use the power supply which comes with it though.
